databases.name: NCBI Nucleotide
databases.description: National Center for Biotechnology Information nucleotide database. Contains DNA and RNA sequences.
databases.notes: Use Entrez Programming Utilities (E-utilities) to search and download sequences.

databases.name: UniProt
databases.description: Universal Protein Resource database for protein sequences and functional information.
databases.notes: Supports REST API for programmatic access to protein sequences and annotations.

databases.name: PDB
databases.description: Protein Data Bank, repository for 3D structural data of proteins and nucleic acids.
databases.notes: Used for retrieving 3D structures and related metadata.

databases.name: KEGG
databases.description: Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes, database for pathways and molecular interaction networks.
databases.notes: Useful for pathway and gene network information.
